Name: Robert
description:
Robert a father of two children is a married man living in Kyenjojo-Uganda. 

His businesses include timber sales, produce buying and selling and a small drug shop where he gets income. He got involved in business to meet his family needs. 

His business plan is to grow his clinic into a renown hospital providing in and outpatient services. 

Despite his dream, Robert faces a challenge of being out competed by government hospitals that provide free services and inadequate capital to purchase enough drugs. 

He will use the loan facility to buy more drugs to sell.
